bill.title: Expresses condolences on the death of Frank M. Edwards, Jr.
bill.description: Expresses condolences on the death of Frank M. Edwards, Jr.

history.action: Read by title, rules suspended, adopted, ordered to the Senate.
Received in the Senate. Read first time by title and placed on the Calendar for a second reading.
Read by title and concurred in by a vote of 33 yeas and 0 nays. Ordered returned to the House.
Received from the Senate without amendments.
Enrolled and signed by the Speaker of the House.
Signed by the President of the Senate.
Taken by the Clerk of the House and presented to the Secretary of State in accordance with the Rules of the House.
